# andro 1. Lord 𓊹 #nTr 𓁩 𓁪 𓁫 𓁬 𓁮 𓁯 2. Second :

𓂋 𓍿 𓀀 | underlings, man | under…, andro 𓀀 𓍿 𓂋 on.t.ro reverse
𓂋 𓍿 𓀀 reverse :
𓍿 𓂋 𓀀 𓁐 𓏥 | (collective n.) man, men, mankind, Egyptians |

NL9 𓈩 ninth northern nome ‘Andjeti 󳙢󳌟󳌠 capital 𓉐𓏤𓊨𓁹𓎟𓊽𓂧𓅱𓊖 Djed/ Djedu [Iti] (Busiris), God Osiris

𓈩 ~ 󳉸 󳉹 󳉺 󳉻 󳉼 󳉽 󳉾 ≠ 󳇾 󳇿 󳈀 󳔛 󳔜 󳔝 <> 󳒯 <> 󳑞 󳑟 󳑠 󳑡 󳑢 󳑣 󳑤 󳑥 󳑦 󳑧 󳑨 󳑩 󳑪 󳑫 󳑬 󳑭 󳑮 󳑯 󳑰 󳑱 󳑲 󳑳 󳑴 󳑵 󳑶 󳑷 󳑸 󳑹 󳑺 󳑻 󳑼 󳑽

𒀭𒌅𒉿𒄴𒄩𒀸 an-tu-wa-aḫ-ḫa-aš “man, human” *h₁n̥dʰwéh₂ōs ἄνθρωπος ánthrōpos

nonsense etymology: *h₁en (“in, inside”) + *dʰweh₂- (“smoke”) + *-ōs, whence also *dʰuh₂mós (“smoke”)) (genitive *h₁n̥dʰuh₂sós, literally “having breath inside”)

alter = ander = 2ⁿᵈ
